SELECT AA.* FROM ( SELECT A.USERID , A.EXPRT_TYPE_CD , A.FLD_LCTR_YN , A.FLD_PLANNG_YN , A.FLD_CNSLTNG_YN , A.FLD_ETC_YN , A.FLD_ETC_CN , A.ENV_EDU_CAREER_YY , A.ENV_EDU_CAREER_MM , E.GROUP_CD_NM AS EXPRT_SBJCT_CD_NM , F.GROUP_CD_NM AS EXPRT_TRGT_CD_NM , IFNULL(D.GROUP_CD_NM, '') AS EXPRT_ACTVT_SCOPE_CD_NM , IFNULL(G.GROUP_CRTFCT_NM,'') AS EXPRT_CRTFCT_NM , B.NM , B.BRDT , B.GNDR , A.MOBLPHON_RLS_YN , A.EML_RLS_YN , A.QLFC_RLS_YN /* 자격 공개 여부 */ , A.HDOF_RLS_YN /* 재직 공개 여부 */ , A.CAREER_RLS_YN /* 경력 공개 여부 */ , ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_ITRST WHERE EXPRTID = A.USERID AND USERID = #{user.userid} ) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS ITRST_YN , CASE WHEN A.USERID = #{user.userid} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ITS_ME , YEAR(NOW()) - LEFT(B.BRDT,4) + 1 AS AGE , C.REG_DT AS MDFCN_DT FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER B ON A.USERID = B.USERID INNER JOIN ( SELECT USERID, STTS_CD, REG_DT FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_MDFCN_DMND WHERE (USERID, REG_DT) IN (SELECT USERID, MAX(REG_DT) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_MDFCN_DMND GROUP BY USERID) AND STTS_CD != '152101' ) C ON A.USERID = C.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TCAC.CTPRVN_NM) AS GROUP_CD_NM, TAEAS.USERID FROM TB_CMM_ADDR_CTPRVN TCAC INNER JOIN TB_ASS_EXPRT_ACTVT_SCOPE TAEAS ON TCAC.CTPRVN_CD = TAEAS.RGN_CD GROUP BY TAEAS.USERID ) D ON A.USERID = D.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TCC.CD_NM) AS GROUP_CD_NM, TAES.USERID FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_SBJCT TAES INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD TCC ON TAES.SBJCT_CD = TCC.CD GROUP BY TAES.USERID ) E ON A.USERID = E.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TCC.CD_NM) AS GROUP_CD_NM, TAET.USERID FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_TRGT TAET INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD TCC ON TAET.TRGT_CD = TCC.CD GROUP BY TAET.USERID ) F ON A.USERID = F.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CRTFCT_NM) AS GROUP_CRTFCT_NM, USERID FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_CRTFCT GROUP BY USERID ) G ON A.USERID = G.USERID WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.EXPRT_TYPE_CD = #{exprtTypeCd}
AND A.FLD_LCTR_YN = 'Y'
AND A.FLD_PLANNG_YN = 'Y'
AND A.FLD_CNSLTNG_YN = 'Y'
AND A.FLD_ETC_YN = 'Y'
AND A.STTS_CD = '134103' /* 승인 상태의 전문가만 조회 */ ) AA WHERE 1 = 1
AND AA.EXPRT_TRGT_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{exprtTrgtCdNm}, '%')
AND AA.EXPRT_SBJCT_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{exprtSbjctCdNm}, '%')
AND AA.EXPRT_ACTVT_SCOPE_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{exprtActvtScopeCdNm}, '%')

SELECT A.EXPRT_TYPE_CD , A.USERID , (SELECT CONCAT_WS(',', CASE WHEN A.FLD_LCTR_YN = 'Y' THEN '강의' END , CASE WHEN A.FLD_PLANNG_YN = 'Y' THEN '기획' END , CASE WHEN A.FLD_CNSLTNG_YN = 'Y' THEN '사업자문 및 컨설팅' END , CASE WHEN A.FLD_ETC_YN = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('기타(',A.FLD_ETC_CN,')') END )) AS FLDS , A.FLD_PLANNG_YN , A.FLD_CNSLTNG_YN , A.FLD_ETC_YN , A.FLD_ETC_CN , A.ENV_EDU_CAREER_YY , A.ENV_EDU_CAREER_MM , A.MOBLPHON_RLS_YN , A.TELNO_RLS_YN , A.EML_RLS_YN , A.QLFC_RLS_YN /* 자격 공개 여부 */ , A.HDOF_RLS_YN /* 재직 공개 여부 */ , A.CAREER_RLS_YN /* 경력 공개 여부 */ , B.NM , B.GNDR , B.BRDT , B.MOBLPHON , B.TELNO , B.EML , CASE WHEN A.USERID = #{user.userid} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ITS_ME , ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_ITRST WHERE EXPRTID = A.USERID AND USERID = #{user.userid} ) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS ITRST_YN , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TCC.CD_NM) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_SBJCT TAES INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD TCC ON TAES.SBJCT_CD = TCC.CD WHERE TAES.USERID = #{userid}) AS EXPRT_SBJCT_CD_NM , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TCC.CD_NM) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_TRGT TAET INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD TCC ON TAET.TRGT_CD = TCC.CD WHERE TAET.USERID = #{userid}) AS EXPRT_TRGT_CD_NM , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TCAC.CTPRVN_NM) FROM TB_CMM_ADDR_CTPRVN TCAC INNER JOIN TB_ASS_EXPRT_ACTVT_SCOPE TAEAS ON TCAC.CTPRVN_CD = TAEAS.RGN_CD WHERE TAEAS.USERID = #{userid}) AS EXPRT_ACTVT_SCOPE_CD_NM FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER B ON A.USERID = B.USERID WHERE A.USERID = #{userid}

SELECT EXPRT_CAREER_ID , FLD_NM , ACTVT_BGNG_DE , ACTVT_END_DE , ACTVT_YN , IF(ACTVT_YN= 'Y', CONCAT(ACTVT_BGNG_DE, ' ~ 활동중' ), CONCAT(ACTVT_BGNG_DE, ' ~ ' , ACTVT_END_DE )) AS ACTVT_DE , ACTVT_HR , IDNTY_INST_NM , ACTVT_CN , IDNTY_DE , CRTF_FILEID , ARTCLASS_FILEID , ORDR FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_CAREER WHERE USERID= #{userid} ORDER BY ORDR
SELECT EXPRT_CRTFCT_ID , CRTFCT_NM , ACQS_INST , ACQS_NO , ACQS_GRD , ACQS_DE , CRTFCT_FILEID , ORDR FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_CRTFCT WHERE USERID= #{userid} ORDER BY ORDR

SELECT EXPRT_HDOF_ID , HDOF_SE_CD , INST_NM , DEPT_NM , JBGD_NM , HDOF_BGNG_DE , HDOF_END_DE , HDOF_YN , IF(HDOF_YN= 'Y', CONCAT(HDOF_BGNG_DE, ' ~ 재직중' ), CONCAT(HDOF_BGNG_DE, ' ~ ' , HDOF_END_DE )) AS HDOF_DE , HDOFCRTF_FILEID , ORDR FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_HDOF WHERE USERID= #{userid} ORDER BY ORDR
